Fire in Panama's largest landfill blows toxic smoke over capitalA large blaze at a garbage dump outside Panama City blew a toxic smoke in the country's capital on Friday, forcing evacuations as firefighters battled to put out the flames that authorities said were likely caused by arson the night before. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:37:50 GMT GADNCLB73FNJHJ2IM6K5DOF5HA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/fire-panamas-largest-landfill-blows-有毒-烟-over-capital-2024-01-19/Reuters世界美洲
Biden hopeful for bipartisan package in Senate on U.S.-Mexico border next weekPresident Joe Biden signaled on Friday that he is hopeful a deal over the U.S.-Mexico border could be worked out next week at least in the Senate, controlled by his Democratic Party, adding that "significant policy changes" were needed. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:01:08 GMT WYTW3YF7BBI7VDM3GYQNCXVAC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/biden-hopeful-bipartisan-package-senate-us-mexico-border-next-week-2024-01-19/Reuters世界美洲
Ethnic killings in one Sudan city left up to 15,000 dead - UN reportBetween 10,000 and 15,000 people were killed in one city in Sudan's West Darfur region last year in ethnic violence by the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) and allied Arab militia, according to a United Nations report seen by Reuters on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 21:54:28 GMT SX3KGKDGDJLZRFIH27UCFVO4II https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ethnic-killings-one-sudan-city-left-up-15000-dead-un-reported-2024-01-19/Michelle Nichols, Maggie Michael世界非洲
Army called in to rescue about 600 Spanish motorists stuck in snowArmy units were mobilised to help about 600 drivers who were stuck on a motorway in heavy snow as Storm Juan blanketed many parts of Spain, authorities said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 21:53:04 GMT YPL3MZ3FT5MLRFHIL2CRBPJZYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/army- Called-rescue-about-600-spanish-motorists-stuck-in-snow-2024-01-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Jordan's PM urges US to take lead in ending Gaza "carnage"The United States and other top powers need to use their influence with Israel to end the ongoing "carnage" in Gaza, Jordan's Prime Minister, Bisher al Khasawaneh, said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 21:00:37 GMT NT6GPVE5QRPYJHLF3CHSBWBID4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordan-pm-urges-us-to-take-lead-ending-gaza-carnage-2024-01-19/Marc Jones世界中东地区
US Democrats push Biden over civilian toll in Israel's Gaza campaignDozens of President Joe Biden's fellow Democrats signed a letter on Friday urging his administration to reaffirm that the United States strongly opposes "the forced and permanent displacement" of Palestinians from Gaza. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 20:53:12 GMT 4JJYFTCEFNO3XK372QR7RHU5QU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-democrats-push-biden-over-civilian-toll-israeli-gaza-campaign-2024-01-19/Patricia Zengerle世界
Three French police officers given suspended jail terms for excessive force during 2017 arrestThree French police officers were handed suspended jail sentences for using excessive force during the 2017 arrest of a young Black man, a French court ruled on Friday, sparking protests outside the courtroom calling for police officers to serve time in prison. Indicted Sierra Leone ex-president Koroma flies to NigeriaSierra Leone's ex-president Ernest Bai Koroma left the West African country by plane and flew to Nigeria on Friday, two Reuters reporters said, after a court allowed him to travel abroad on medical grounds despite treason charges. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 18:57:43 GMT CVKTFQWUIBONNLDHJ743RKOGXI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/indicted-sierra-leone-ex-president-koroma-flies-nigeria-2024-01-19/Reuters世界非洲
EU targets six people under new Hamas sanctions schemeThe European Union on Friday imposed asset freezes and travel bans on six people it said were linked to Hamas, under a new sanctions regime targeting the Palestinian militant group.
